source:
# HTTP 요청 
import requests
# 암호화폐 거래소 API 
import ccxt

#앤드포인트 url
url = "https://api.blockchain.info/charts/transactions-per-second?timespan=5days&rollingAverage=8hours&format=json"
 
# binance 거래소에 접근 
exchange = ccxt.binance()
# 암호화폐 지정 (비트코인)
symbol = 'BTC/USDT'

response = requests.get(url)
#데이터 파싱
# => 200은 요청 성공 
if response.status_code == 200: #상태 코드 인식 후 오류여부 판단
    try:
        # 응답 json 형태 
        data = response.json()
        # 마지막 values y의 값 가져옴 (초당 거래량)
        transactions_per_second = data["values"][-1]["y"]
        # 초당 거래량을 일일 거래량으로 변환 (1일 = 86,400초)
        transactions_per_day = transactions_per_second * 86_400
        # 일일 거래량 출력 
        print("Bitcoin on-chain transaction volume: {:,.0f} transactions per day".format(transactions_per_day))

        # 현재 시세 정보 get 
        ticker = exchange.fetch_ticker(symbol)
        price = ticker['last']		#현재가를 가져옵니다.
        transaction_volume_usd = transactions_per_day * price
        # 달러 기준 거래량 출력 
        print("Bitcoin on-chain transaction volume: ${:,.2f}".format(transaction_volume_usd))
    except ValueError:
        print("Could not parse response as JSON.")
else:
    print("Request failed with status code", response.status_code)

import requests
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
import datetime

# 트랜잭션 api 정보 30일 이내로 get 
url = "https://api.blockchain.info/charts/n-transactions?format=json&timespan=30days"

# api get 요청 => response 
response = requests.get(url)

# 응답 data 
data = response.json()

# 날짜와 거래량 데이터를 넣을 빈 리스트 + 
dates = []
volumes = []	

#  데이터 안에 타임스탬프를 정보를 %Y-%m-%d형태로 가공 => 그래프 x축에 리스트 input 
for point in data['values']:
    dates.append(datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(point['x']).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
#  트랜잭션 정보 y축에 input 
    volumes.append(point['y'])
     
# 날짜 및 볼륨 리스트 합쳐서 데이터 프레임 생성 (표) 
df = pd.DataFrame({'date': dates, 'volume': volumes})

# 거래량 데이터 int 형식으로 변환 
df['volume'] = df['volume'].astype(int) 

# date 컬럼 인덱스 
df.set_index('date', inplace=True)
df.plot(kind='line', figsize=(12, 6), color='blue')
plt.xlabel("Date")  
plt.ylabel("Transaction Volume (BTC)")
plt.title("Bitcoin On-Chain Transaction Volume")
plt.show()

import requests
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
import datetime

# CoinCecko API 20일로 설정 
url = "https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/bitcoin/market_chart?vs_currency=usd&days=20&interval=daily&precision=%20"
# get access => url info 
response = requests.get(url)
# json 
data = response.json()
# marketcapdata(시가총액) => 타임스탬프를 형식으로 변경 
market_cap_data = [(datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(item[0]/1000).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'), item[1]) for item in data["market_caps"]]
# 그래프 
df = pd.DataFrame(market_cap_data, columns=['Date', 'Market Cap'])
# 날짜별로 그룹해서 평균 마켓 캡 계산 
df = df.groupby('Date').mean().reset_index()

plt.plot(df['Date'], df["Market Cap"])
plt.xlabel('Date')
plt.ylabel('Market Cap (in USD)')
plt.title('Bitcoin Market Cap for the Last 30 Days (averaged by day)')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

import streamlit as st
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import requests
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
import datetime

url = "https://api.blockchain.info/charts/n-transactions?format=json&timespan=30days"

response = requests.get(url)
data = response.json()

dates = []
volumes = []	 
prices = []
for point in data['values']:
    dates.append(datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(point['x']).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
    volumes.append(point['y'])
    prices.append(point['x'])
 
df = pd.DataFrame({'date': dates, 'volume': volumes})
df['volume'] = df['volume'].astype(float)
df['prices'] = df['volume'].astype(float)
df['volume_usd'] = df['volume']*df['prices']


url = "https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/bitcoin/market_chart?vs_currency=usd&days=30&interval=daily"
response = requests.get(url)
data = response.json()

market_cap_data = [(datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(item[0]/1000).strftime('%Y-%m-%d'), item[1]) for item in data["market_caps"]]
df2 = pd.DataFrame(market_cap_data, columns=['Date', 'Market Cap'])
df2['Market Cap'] = df2['Market Cap'].astype(float)
df2 = df2.groupby('Date').mean().reset_index()
df2['nvt'] = df2['Market Cap']/df['volume_usd']


st.write("#🧊 Blockchain Intelligence Lab 👨🏻‍🔬")

st.line_chart(df2.set_index('Date')['nvt'])

import math

def attacker_success_probability(q, z):
    p = 1.0 - q
    lambda_ = z * (q / p)
    sum_ = 1.0
    for k in range(z+1):
        poisson = math.exp(-lambda_)
        for i in range(1, k+1):
            poisson *= lambda_ / i
        sum_ -= poisson * (1 - ((q / p) ** (z - k)))
        print(f"Step {k}: Probability = {poisson}, Sum = {sum_}")
    return sum_

# Test the function
attacker_success_probability(0.1, 5)
